title: VIGILante

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Shoot a player at night. 3 uses. This cannot be used N1.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you shoot a town member, the next day you will hold a silent vigil, blocking you from seeing daychat, whispering, being whispered to, or voting.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who oppose the Town.
